headline: Blackstone Weighs Energy And ICT Exits While Eyeing IPL Cricket Stake
summary: Blackstone (NYSE:BX) is exploring a potential sale of Beacon Offshore Energy as part of a wider portfolio reshaping effort. The firm is also weighing options for Interplex Holdings’ ICT unit, including a possible sale. Separately, Blackstone is assessing bids for a stake in Indian Premier League franchise Royal Challengers Bengaluru, signaling interest in major sports assets. Blackstone, one of the largest global alternative asset managers, often revisits its holdings across private equity,...
